alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 2:43PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila County through 330 PM MST... At 242 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Payson to Rye to Jakes Corner. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payson, Star Valley, Oxbow Estates, Round Valley, East Verde Estates, Mesa Del Caballo, Jakes Corner, Gisela, Rye, Deer Creek and Houston Mesa Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 252 and 257. State Route 188 between mile markers 271 and 276. State Route 87 southbound between mile markers 241 and 251. State Route 87 between mile markers 231 and 259. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
